[{"text":"变更唐超为“新产品平台开发项目”项目经理","href":"#","statusInfo":"待审","statusColor":"primary","cateName":"项目变更","cateHref":"#","creator":{"fdId":"t00174742","fdName":"唐超","fdLoginName":"tangchao_kf"},"created":1562375640164,"icon":{"name":"new","type":"bitmap"}},{"text":"​申请开通BMP合同管理和项目管理权限","href":"#","statusInfo":"驳回","statusColor":"warning","cateName":"系统权限申请","cateHref":"#","creator":{"fdId":"t00174742","fdName":"郑超","fdLoginName":"tangchao_kf"},"created":1560403200164},{"text":"​产品研发中心申请新增Docker服务器用于体验环境搭建","href":"#","statusInfo":"待审","statusColor":"primary","cateName":"服务器资源申请","cateHref":"#","creator":{"fdId":"t00174742","fdName":"周梓凡","fdLoginName":"tangchao_kf"},"created":1557132149164},{"text":"​五一节前休假申请","href":"#","statusInfo":"废弃","statusColor":"info","cateName":"请假申请流程","cateHref":"#","creator":{"fdId":"t00174742","fdName":"杨建宏","fdLoginName":"tangchao_kf"},"created":1552290000164},{"text":"​关于成都分公司来深参与研发的人员电脑MAC信息登记","href":"#","statusInfo":"结束","statusColor":"success","cateName":"上网资源申请","cateHref":"#","creator":{"fdId":"t00174742","fdName":"易荣烽","fdLoginName":"tangchao_kf"},"created":1547345700164},{"text":"个人自备电脑补贴申请","href":"#","statusInfo":"草稿","statusColor":"weaken","cateName":"个人笔记本公用","cateHref":"#","creator":{"fdId":"t00174742","fdName":"唐超","fdLoginName":"tangchao_kf"},"created":1547345700164}]
